meanings.definition: Stories written by fans of a particular TV show, movie, book, etc., using the characters and settings from the original work.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading fanfics about my favorite characters.
meanings.sent2: She spends hours reading fanfics online.
meanings.sent3: The fanfics she wrote about the show were so funny!
meanings.sent4: Her imagination in creating fanfics knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The fanfics brought the characters to life in a whole new way.

meanings.definition: A person who is a fan of fan fiction.
meanings.sent1: He is a dedicated fanfics who loves discussing different stories.
meanings.sent2: The fanfics was excited to attend the fan fiction convention.
meanings.sent3: The fanfics was thrilled to meet the author of their favorite story.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the ultimate fanfics among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The fanfics always had new recommendations for fan fiction enthusiasts.
